ðŸ“– Summary: GridDB is a next-generation open-source database designed for time series, IoT, and big data applications. It offers both NoSQL and SQL interfaces, aiming for fast and easy data management. The repository includes server and Java client components, with additional JDBC driver support available in a separate repository.
